      • login

        public static int login(Context context,
        java.lang.String email,
        java.lang.String password)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Login to the GeroLab cloud. Method is synchronous.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        email - Email.
        password - Password. PASSWORD_LENGTH_MIN to PASSWORD_LENGTH_MAX characters.
        Returns:
        Status code.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of parameters is incorrect.

      • logout

        Performs user logout.

        context - Application context.

      • register

        public static int register(Context context,
           java.lang.String email,
           java.lang.String password,
           java.lang.String name,
           boolean isMale,
           java.lang.String birthday,
           int weight,
           int height)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Register to the GeroLab cloud. Method is synchronous.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        email - Email.
        password - Password. PASSWORD_LENGTH_MIN to PASSWORD_LENGTH_MAX characters.
        name - User name.
        isMale - true if gender is male, false otherwise.
        birthday - Birthday in yyyy-MM-dd format.
        weight - Weight in grams. From WEIGHT_MIN_GRAM to WEIGHT_MAX_GRAM.
        height - Height in cm. From HEIGHT_MIN_CM to HEIGHT_MAX_CM.
        Returns:
        Status code.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of parameters is incorrect.

      • restorePassword

        public static int restorePassword(Context context,
                  java.lang.String email)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Restores user's password. Email will be sent. Method is synchronous.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        email - Email.
        Returns:
        Status code.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of parameters is incorrect.

      • startDataCapture

        public static void startDataCapture(Context context)
        Start accelerometer data capture. Call this method after successful login or register.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.

      • stopDataCapture

        public static void stopDataCapture(Context context)
        Stop accelerometer data capture. Call this method if user would like to stop data capture.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.

      • updateUserInfo

        public static int updateUserInfo(Context context,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 boolean isMale,
                 java.lang.String birthday,
                 int weight,
                 int height)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Updates user info at GeroLab cloud. User must be logged in. Method is synchronous.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        name - User name.
        isMale - true if gender is male, false otherwise.
        birthday - Birthday in yyyy-MM-dd format.
        weight - Weight in grams. From WEIGHT_MIN_GRAM to WEIGHT_MAX_GRAM.
        height - Height in cm. From HEIGHT_MIN_CM to HEIGHT_MAX_CM.
        Returns:
        Status code.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of parameters is incorrect.
